thread.title: Capitals roll out the red carpet for season opener
thread.title_full: Capitals roll out the red carpet for season opener

title: Capitals roll out the red carpet for season opener
text:
Capitals roll out the red carpet for season opener Resize Text By Clinton Yates October 10 at 5:16 PM Follow @clintonyates 
In their grand tradition of doing The Most, the Washington Capitals have literally rolled out a red carpet to start the 2015-16 NHL season. It’s a fun bit, and people seem to be into it from the photos showing up on social media. 
— Washington Capitals (@washcaps) October 10, 2015 Some new Capitals player doing his red carpet interview pic.twitter.com/AZvSarQreI 
— Jordan Greenberg (@JGreenberg81) October 10, 2015 
That’s a pretty funny caption, actually. Because it’s T.J. Oshie you see, and he’s famous, a darling gentleman , his kid is a style icon and he’s an American Hero blah blah blah, okay nevermind. Oh oh! Look over there on the red carpet! Today's @JapersRink Game Day Infographic is here! http://t.co/5Fdsh5kMBK pic.twitter.com/tuOsJ51QOW 
— CAPITALS HILL (@CapitalsHill) October 10, 2015 
The Capitals play the New Jersey Devils tonight at Verizon Center. The puck drops at 7 p.m. Clinton Yates is a D.C. native and an online columnist. When he's not covering the city, pop culture or listening to music, he watches sports. A lot of them. sports Success! Check your inbox for details.
